name: inSilicoFragmentationBenchmark
description: benchmark of the insilico fragmentation tool
author: Ricardo

scripts.test: npm run test-only && npm run check-types && npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.tsc: npm run clean && npm run tsc-build
scripts.challenge: node -e "import('./src/challenger.js').then(({ default: runChallenger }) => runChallenger({ testMode: false })).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.challenge-test: node -e "import('./src/challenger.js').then(({ default: runChallenger }) => runChallenger({ testMode: true })).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); });"
